items.summary: Resize the 'ETHOS Towing & Recovery' text in the Header component for mobile viewports so it fits properly within the available header area without overflowing or being cut off

Remove Jump Start Service as a separate seventh service card from the Services component and incorporate jump start assistance into the Vehicle Recovery service description, renaming the Vehicle Recovery service to 'Vehicle Recovery & Jump Start' or similar appropriate title
Fix the chatbot 'Fill out form' suggestion button functionality so that clicking or tapping it properly opens/displays the contact form on all devices including mobile
Update the chatbot responses in frontend/src/utils/chatbotResponses.ts to reflect that Jump Start Service is now part of Vehicle Recovery services rather than a standalone offering
